entry.string: Invalid args (field key must be set.)
entry.translation: Ugyldige parametre (feltnøglen skal være sat.)

entry.string: Available configurations
entry.translation: Tilgængelige opsætninger

entry.string: Security Hint
entry.translation: Sikkerhedstip

entry.string: If you are feeling even more security conscious you could remove read access from those who don't need it
entry.translation: Hvis du er endnu mere sikkerhedsbevidst, kan du fjerne læseadgangen for dem, der ikke har brug for den

entry.string: The following modules for this configuration are already installed
entry.translation: Følgende moduler i denne opsætning er allerede installeret

entry.string: The following modules for this configuration are missing in the modules directory
entry.translation: Følgende moduler i denne opsætning mangler i modulmappen

entry.string: Display name
entry.translation: Visningsnavn

entry.string: Language
entry.translation: Sprog

entry.string: For Xaraya to function properly, the installer must write your database information to the file:
entry.translation: For at Xaraya kan fungere ordentligt, skal installationen skrive dine databaseoplysninger til filen:

entry.string: If your settings are not correct, this script will not be able to do so. The installer needs write access for steps 3 and 4 only.
entry.translation: Hvis dine indstillinger ikke er korrekte, vil skriptet ikke kunne gøre det. Installationen har kun brug for skriveadgang i tredje og fjerde trin.

entry.string: PHP Version is greater than or equal to 4.1.2. Your PHP Version is:
entry.translation: PHP-versionen er højere eller lig med 4.1.2. Din PHP-version er:

entry.string: PHP Version is less than 4.1.2. Your PHP Version is:
entry.translation: PHP-versionen er mindre end 4.1.2. Din PHP-version er:

entry.string: Please upgrade PHP.
entry.translation: Opgradér din PHP-installation.

entry.string: The installer cannot write to the configuration file. Please verify that your webserver has write access to the file:
entry.translation: Installationen kan ikke skrive opsætningsfilen. Tjek at din webserver har skriveadgang til filen:

entry.string: The installer can write to the directory:
entry.translation: Installationen kan skrive til mappen:

entry.string: The installer cannot write to this directory:
entry.translation: Installationen kan ikke skrive til denne mappe:

entry.string: Please verify that your webserver has write access to the directory:
entry.translation: Tjek at din webserver har skriveadgang til mappen:

entry.string: Please verify that your webserver has write access to this directory:
entry.translation: Tjek at din webserver har skriveadgang til denne mappe:

entry.string: The installer cannot write to the directory:
entry.translation: Installationen kan ikke skrive til mappen:

entry.string: These extensions may be required for some modules to work; however the Xaraya core is not dependant on these extensions for installation. Refer to PHP.net for further information on these extensions.
entry.translation: Disse udvidelser er muligvis nødvendige for at visse af modulerne kan fungere. Xaraya-kernen er dog ikke afhængig af disse udvidelser for at kunne installeres. Tjek PHP.net for yderligere oplysninger om disse udvidelser.

entry.string: The MySQL Extension is not loaded. Xaraya will need either the PGSQL or MySQL extension to be loaded to proceed.
entry.translation: MySQL-udvidelsen er ikke indlæst. Xaraya har brug for at enten PGSQL- eller MySQL-udvidelsen er indlæst, før den kan fortsætte.

entry.string: The PGSQL Extension is not loaded. Xaraya will need either the PGSQL or MySQL extension to be loaded to proceed.
entry.translation: PGSQL-udvidelsen er ikke indlæst. Xaraya har brug for at enten PGSQL- eller MySQL-udvidelsen er indlæst, før den kan fortsætte.

entry.string: The XSLT Extension is not loaded. This extension is only needed for the XSLT transform module at this time.
entry.translation: XSLT-udvidelsen er ikke indlæst. Denne udvidelse er kun påkrævet af XSLT-transformeringsmodulet.

entry.string: The LDAP Extension is not loaded. This extension is only needed if you intend on using LDAP authentication with the Xaraya LDAP Modules.
entry.translation: LDAP-udvidelsen er ikke indlæst. Denne udvidelse kræves kun, hvis du har planer om at benytte LDAP-autentifikation med Xarayas LDAP-moduler.

entry.string: The GD Extension is not loaded. This extension is only needed for the images module at this time for resizing of thumbnails.
entry.translation: GD-udvidelsen er ikke indlæst. Denne udvidelse er kun påkrævet at "images"-modulet til at nedskalere frimærkevisninger.

entry.string: Check Again >
entry.translation: Tjek igen >

entry.string: IMPORT NOTE: If you plan on upgrading to Xaraya from a previous version or another Weblog/CMS, install as normal, then run the provided upgrade script.
entry.translation: BEMÆRKNING OM IMPORTERING: Hvis du vil opgradere til Xaraya fra en tidligere version eller en anden Weblog/CMS, så installér som normalt og kør derefter opgraderingsskriptet.

entry.string: UPGRADE NOTE: If you are upgrading from a previous version of Xaraya, please use the provided upgrade script. The installer could overwrite your current database data.
entry.translation: BEMÆRKNING OM OPGRADERING: Hvis du opgraderer fra en tidligere Xaraya-version, så brug opgraderingsskriptet. Installationen kan overskrive dine eksisterende databasedata.

entry.string: (for SQLite: a directory)
entry.translation: (for SQLite: en mappe)

entry.string: < Back
entry.translation: < Tilbage

entry.string: Please enter the settings for your Administrator account. This information is necessary in order to properly secure your Xaraya installation. These settings can be changed at any point in the future by visiting the roles module.
entry.translation: Angiv din administratorkontos indstillinger. Disse oplysninger er nødvendige for din Xaraya-installations sikkerhed. Indstillingerne kan ændres senere i rollemodulet.

entry.string: System Settings Check
entry.translation: Tjek af systemindstillinger

entry.string: For Xaraya to function properly, the installer must write your database information to the file #(1). If your settings are not correct, this script will not be able to do so. The installer needs write access for steps 3 and 4 only.
PHP Version is greater than or equal to 4.1.2. Your PHP Version is #(1)
PHP Version is less than 4.1.2. Your PHP Version is #(1) please upgrade PHP.
Xaraya needs a MINIMUM of 8 Megabyte of PHP memory (16M or higher STRONGLY recommended). The current memory limit is #(1).
Xaraya needs a MINIMUM of 8 Megabyte of PHP memory. ( 16M or higher STRONGLY recommended) The current memory limit is #(1).
Especially if you are planning to install modules during the install phase, a lot of memory is required. When in doubt, do a core only install and install modules manually later.
The installer can write to the configuration file.
entry.translation: Installationen kan skrive til opsætningefilen.

entry.string: The installer cannot write to the configuration file. Please verify that your webserver has write access to the file #(1)
The installer can write to the directory #(1)
The installer cannot write to the directory #(1). Please verify that your webserver has write access to the directory #(2)
The installer cannot write to the #(1). Please verify that your webserver has write access to the directory #(2)
Xaraya can write to the directory #(1) and all its files and subdirectories.
Xaraya cannot write to the directory #(1) and all its files and subdirectories.
The XML Extension is loaded.
entry.translation: XML-udvidelsen er indlæst.

entry.string: The XML Extension is not loaded.
entry.translation: XML-udvidelsen er ikke indlæst.

entry.string: The MySQL Extension is loaded.
entry.translation: MySQL-udvidelsen er indlæst.

entry.string: The MySQL Extension is not loaded. Xaraya will need either the PGSQL or MySQL extension to be loaded to proceed.
The PGSQL Extension is loaded.
entry.translation: PGSQL-udvidelsen er indlæst.

entry.string: The PGSQL Extension is not loaded. Xaraya will need either the PGSQL or MySQL extension to be loaded to proceed.
The XSLT Extension is loaded.
entry.translation: XSLT-udvidelsen er indlæst.

entry.string: The XSLT Extension is not loaded. This extension is only needed for the XSLT transform module at this time.
The LDAP Extension is loaded.
entry.translation: LDAP-udvidelsen er indlæst.

entry.string: The LDAP Extension is not loaded. This extension is only needed if you intend on using LDAP authentication with the Xaraya LDAP Modules.
The GD Extension is loaded.
entry.translation: GD-udvidelsen er indlæst.

entry.string: The GD Extension is not loaded. This extension is only needed for the images module at this time for resizing of thumbnails.
Please enter your database settings. You can connect to databases on non-standard ports using 'hostname:port' in the Host field. (e.g. 'localhost:12345')
entry.translation: Angiv dine databaseindstillinger. Du kan forbinde dig til databaser på ikke-standardporte med formatet 'værtsnavn:port' i værtsfeltet (f.eks. 'localhost:12345')

entry.string: If you do not have root access to your database (due to virtual hosting, etc.), you will need to have a pre-existing one configured before you proceed.
entry.translation: Hvis du ikke har root-adgang til din databaseserver, er du nødt til at få oprettet en database, før du kan fortsætte.

entry.string: UPGRADE NOTE: If you plan on upgrading to Xaraya from a previous version or another Weblog/CMS, install as normal, then run the provided upgrade script.
Create the database
entry.translation: Opret databasen

entry.string: This option specifies whether you need the install to create the empty database for you first or whether it can just populate an already existing database. If you cannot create databases through phpMyAdmin because of virtual hosting or MySQL security settings, the installer will not be able to create the database for you. It will be able to populate an already existing one though.
entry.translation: Denne indstilling angiver om du skal vil have oprettet en tom database under installationen, eller om der blot skal fyldes på en eksisterende database. Hvis du ikke har adgang til at oprette databaserne med f.eks. phpMyAdmin, vil installationen heller ikke kunne oprette databasen for dig. Den vil dog kunne benytte en eksisterende database.

entry.string: This may take a moment. Thank you for your patience.
entry.translation: Det kan tage et øjeblik. Tak for din tålmodighed.

entry.string: If your browser does not redirect automatically to the next page in a few seconds, please click here :
continue
If you continue, tables using the #(1)_ prefix will be overwritten.
entry.translation: Hvis du fortsætter, vil tabeller, hvis navn starter med #(1)_ prefix blive overskrevet.
